content: repeat from * to last st end k1 row 4 purl row 5 * knit 4 k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 row 6 p1 * p2tog purl 3 repeat from * to end of row row 7 * knit 2 k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 row 8 p1 * p2tog purl 1 repeat from * to end of row row 9 * k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 cut the yarn leaving a 18 tail thread it through the remaining stitches draw up tightly and secure sew up side seam using mattress st weave in the ends ©2025 plymouth yarn company 021825jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side st st = stockinette st
